result.title: Secure State Sharing and Intelligent Reconfiguration for Edge Computing - M27 release
result.description: This deliverable is the prototype implementation with an accompanying report of the secure state sharing (plug-in) mechanisms is be implemented in Task T3.2. These mechanisms are used as a basis for synchronizing the physical and cyber worlds based on the outcomes of tasks T3.4. This is the second of two incremental releases.

result.title: Blueprint Solutions and Strategies for Migrating to Decentralized Factory Automation Architectures - M30 release
result.description: This deliverable documents strategies for cost-effective migration of conventional automation architectures to hybrid and decentralized ones. The strategies are based on blueprint architectures, which are variants of the project’s core edge computing architecture. The deliverable reflects the results of T3.7. This is the third of three incremental releases.

result.title: Project Workshops
result.description:
Holding of dedicated workshops by GRIDSOL consortium, both for facilitating the communication with the end users and keeping them informed about the progress and achievements of the project. One of them will be included under the umbrella of ICREAS conference (Practical Applications of Agents and Multi-Agent Sytem).
This deliverable relates to Task 9.3 – Workshops and events with stakeholders.
